TestCase.name: testFilterPushDown
TestCase.Resource: insert into MySink select * from MyTable where a > 10

LogicalSink(table=[default_catalog.default_database.MySink], fields=[a, b, c]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[>($0, 10)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]])

Sink(table=[default_catalog.default_database.MySink], fields=[a, b, c]) +- Calc(select=[a, b, c], where=[>(a, 10)]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, filter=[greaterThan(a, 10)]]], fields=[a, b, c])
